post.description: This API associates products with an account. Only a maximum of 10 products can be associated with an account through a single API request.
This API merges two or more accounts.

get.description: This API lists the accounts associated with a particular contact.

schema.description: Sort by a specific attribute: @accountName@ or @createdTime@ or @mappingType@ . The default sorting order is ascending. A @-@ prefix denotes descending order of sorting.

get.description: This API fetches the overall statistics of an account.
This API lists tickets received from a specific account.
This API lists a particular number of accounts, based on the limit specified.Â

post.description: This API creates an account in your help desk portal.

schema.description: Contract Status,Indicates the Current Status of the Contract, Values are @ACTIVE@, @EXPIRED@, @FUTURE@

get.description: This API fetches an account from your help desk portal.
This API fetches the ticket history of an account.

post.description: This API moves the accounts specified to the Recycle Bin.

get.description: This API lists the accounts associated with a product

post.description: This API updates multiple accounts at once.
